name: Speedy Car Drive: Pro Racing
description:
No stops, no breaks and no Second Chance!

When you start the race it’s all about winning the race second or third place is not enough!

Speedy Car Drive - Ultimate Racing is best arcade game to enjoy race with Cars and Block. Drive fast on the platforms! Take boosts! Dodge as long as you can to improve your score! But don't Crash Down!

Enjoy racing in endless and career mode. Rush through colorful ramp, avoid blocks on twisty track and enjoy thrilling racing adventure. Do not smash the car on block if you want to win. Beware of sudden twist and turns. Watch out the surprising obstacles that are going to distract you. Let the adrenalin rush in your body.

Finish the race as fast as you can, pick up boosts to speed up, dive through hurdles and earn more coins to unlock the new vehicles. This game is designed just for the race lovers. In this game you have to show your racing skills to prove yourself as racing pro. 3D Car Models, Perfect Controls, Mad Twists & Turns, Coolest Stunts, Realistic Arts, Awesome Soundtrack are going to lead you on a new journey of excitement.

Let’s see if you can survive in this crazy race adventure with twisted blocky roads!

Speedy Car Drive - Ultimate Racing Features:
• 3D blocky environment
• Career and Endless mode
• Variety of cars to choose from
• Addictive real physics based game play
• Realistic sound effects
• Engaging car driving experience
• Action packed variety of levels
• Unique and full of surprise tricky track
• Easy controls and fun to play
